results.definition: be undecided about something; waver between conflicting positions or courses of action
examples: He oscillates between accepting the new position and retirement
The shy student lingered in the corner

results.definition: hang in the air; fly or be suspended above
be suspended in the air, as if in defiance of gravity
examples: The guru claimed that he could levitate

results.definition: hang over, as of something threatening, dark, or menacing
examples: The terrible vision brooded over her all day long
